title: Fonts.com
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116015736/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Font Retailers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116015736/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Retailers) : Fonts.com**

[Fonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116015736/http:/www.fonts.com/) is an internet resource for all things fonts. Fonts.com presents a wide selection of fonts to preview, purchase and download. Fonts.com also provides typographic news, tips, and typeface releases.

Fonts.com is owned and operated by [Monotype Imaging, Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116015736/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype%20Imaging%2C%20Inc.), formerly [Agfa Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116015736/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agfa%20Monotype).
